title: Cryptoababe
author: Cryptoababe
content: Bull Market is where people buy at the top while bear market is where people sell at loss.Meanwhile, Everything is casued by Fear and greed.Thats allBy the way, we need some good advices on Bull and Bear Market on this thread.Thanks in advance

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Bull market when we sell, bear market we have to buy as much as possible, maybe that's the general advice.Don't panic, don't be greedy because that's what will make you worse, just do what you can afford with a long-term investment because of the fact that it will be a good solution for us in the future, maybe now bears are bad for us because which is so long, but we have to think it's a good way of buying to be ready to sell its Bullrun later.But when people go into panic they won't be able to buy even the slightest bit when it's bear.

comments.author: Cryptoababe

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoababe on October 08, 2022, 03:12:50 PMBy the way, we need some good advices on Bull and Bear Market on this thread.Thanks in advance Human emotions works in that way, if they see a trend they will go behind it until they realize they are at the last of their queue there isn't going to be much benefits for them. But for any speculative asset this is common so when you see people are selling then start accumulating and sell when people are buying and this is simple trick can make you billionaire in few years depends on how much capital you have to start with.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoababe on October 08, 2022, 03:12:50 PMBull Market is where people buy at the top while bear market is where people sell at loss.Meanwhile, Everything is casued by Fear and greed.Thats allBy the way, we need some good advices on Bull and Bear Market on this thread.Thanks in advance Yeah, but on the contrary, bull market is when you sell your altcoins that you have been accumulating in bear market.I don't think you can get more advise, just the basic or what I said, choose solid coin to buy during  the bear market. I give you one example, ETH in the bear market was at it lowest below $100, so if you buy a ton and then sell it during the bull run wherein it went as high as $4000++ then that is a huge profit already.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: threads with titles like this are very common and boring to make the same answer, we know that people buy when the market is bullish and sell when the market is bearishif only they changed their mindset by buying when the market was bearish and selling when the market was bullish it would be cooler, but that's the way of thinking humans are always afraid of risk so selling at a loss according to him is the right way even though it is a fatal mistake, hoping the price will drop them selling it and waiting below is also a wrong move, they should look at past history to learn how to take advantage of the current situation

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: What other advice is there to give? I mean if there any other advice left than what has already been given? I started of Crypto-currency with curiosity, but never was that curiosity about making big bag investment, this layer brick hard foundations for me, I don't get moved in the dip and even if Bitcoin goes lower than $2000 I won't panic at all.FOMO, FUD are for those who don't even have a knowledgeable Crypto-currency background and can decipher situations for themselves, they came in courtesy trending news of crypto-currency rising and many goes through the exit door when the trending news is Crypto-currency is dead.

comments.author: zasad@

And this is very difficult, because most of the people who bought bitcoin more than $50,000 were waiting for the price to rise.

comments.body: No matter what the conditions of the market are, investors must do their own research in order to see through scam projects and shit projects.  Those that are too good to be true offers often ends up being a scam so we should be careful on our dealings in the market.We can always look at the team composition as initial research.  See if the roadmap and white paper is feasible.  Many projects offer a roadmap that isn't viable.Quote from: DoublerHunter on October 08, 2022, 08:11:49 PMQuote from: Cryptoababe on October 08, 2022, 03:12:50 PMBull Market is where people buy at the top while bear market is where people sell at loss.Meanwhile, Everything is casued by Fear and greed.~snip~^Because they are newbies, probably. comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoababe on October 08, 2022, 03:12:50 PMBull Market is where people buy at the top while bear market is where people sell at loss.Meanwhile, Everything is casued by Fear and greed.Thats allBy the way, we need some good advices on Bull and Bear Market on this thread.Thanks in advance The best advice is to do the opposite of what you are saying, buy in a bear market and sell in a bull market. All we are going through are market cycles, objectively these things are never new, everything has happened before and everything keeps repeating itself. So those who have experienced bear seasons before, they see this as an opportunity to accumulate as much as possible, not a time to panic. Panic only comes to newbies and for me it's better to let them experience the reality, there's no better advice than to experience it for yourself.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: The bull market is when everyone shares positive opinions about Bitcoin. The bear market is when everyone shares the most negative opinions about Bitcoin. Also, in the bull market, all the TV channels make positive news about Bitcoin and tell that Bitcoin is a great technology. The same news channels can say that in the bear market Bitcoin is almost a ponzi... These two different views are not contradictory because there is no logic in TV channels. :)

But we should invest in the current bear market for the long term to the future bull market, because that should be the difference between bull and bear market.
